card.name: Snowbird
card.property: Creature forms enter play facedown. Great Beasts - Action: Spend a resource of any type → flip each faceup creature form. Then, choose a facedown creature form and flip it. Snowbird gains each TRAIT on that creature form.

alternate.name: Narya
alternate.property: Creature forms enter play facedown. Demigoddess - Response: After Narya heals, for each point of excess damage healed beyond her maximum hit points, heal 1 damage from a friendly character.

card.name: Shaman
card.property: Hero Action: Exhaust Shaman and deal 1 damage to him → draw 1 card.
"There is a richness to life that ou have not yet begun even to suspect, Narya. Do not deny yourself this fullness."

card.name: Artic Assault
card.property: Hero Action (attack): Deal 5 damage to an enemy. Resolve Snowbird's "Great Beasts" ability for free. Deal damage to an enemy equal to your ATK.
"Sasquatch is not the only one with strength"-Snowbird

card.name: Boreal Boost
card.property: Hero Action: (thwart): Remove 4 threat from a scheme. Resolve Snowbird's "Great Beasts" ability for free. Remove X threat from a scheme, where X is equal to your THW.
"You have made a grave mistake."-Snowbird

card.name: Fluid Formation
card.property: Hero Action: Resolve Snowbird's "Great Beasts" ability for free. Draw X cards, where X is equal to your THW

card.name: Heavy Hide
card.property: Hero Action (defense): When you would take any amount of damage, resolve Snowbird's "Great Beasts" ability for free. Reduce the amount of damage taken by X, where X is equal to your DEF.

card.name: Great White North
card.property: Hero Resource: Exhaust Great White North → generate the resource on the faceup creature form. If the printed resource on the card you are playing is the same resource, generate 2 of that resource instead.
"it's a beauty way to go." -Puck

card.name: Bear
card.property: Creature form. Snowbird gets -1 THW, +1 DEF and retaliate 1. response: After you play a DEFENSE card, exhaust Bear → draw 1 card.

alternate.name: Bear
alternate.property: Creature form. Snowbird gets -1 THW, +1 DEF and retaliate 1. response: After you play a DEFENSE card, exhaust Bear → draw 1 card.

card.name: Dinosaur
card.property: Creature form. Snowbird gets -1 ATK, +1 DEF and her attacks gain piercing Hero Action: Exhaust Dinosaur → reduce the cost of the next ATTACK card you play this round by 1.

alternate.name: Dinosaur
alternate.property: Creature form. Snowbird gets -1 ATK, +1 DEF and her attacks gain piercing Hero Action: Exhaust Dinosaur → reduce the cost of the next ATTACK card you play this round by 1.

card.name: Human
card.property: Setup. Creature form.This card cannot be discarded. Enters play faceup. Narya gets + 1 hand size. Hero Action: Exhaust Human → Search your deck for a creature form and add it to your hand.

alternate.name: Human
alternate.property: Setup. Creature form.This card cannot be discarded. Enters play faceup. Narya gets + 1 hand size. Hero Action: Exhaust Human → Search your deck for a creature form and add it to your hand.

card.name: Owl
card.property: Creature form. Snowbird gets +1 THW, +1 ATK and ignores guard and patrol. Hero Action: Exhaust Owl → reduce the cost of the next THWART card you play this round by 1.

alternate.name: Owl
alternate.property: Creature form. Snowbird gets +1 THW, +1 ATK and ignores guard and patrol. Hero Action: Exhaust Owl → reduce the cost of the next THWART card you play this round by 1.

card.name: Seal
card.property: Creature form. Snowbird gets -1 ATK, +1 DEF and gains agile 1. Hero Action: Exhaust Seal → reduce the cost of the next TACTIC card you play this round by 1.

alternate.name: Seal
alternate.property: Creature form. Snowbird gets -1 ATK, +1 DEF and gains agile 1. Hero Action: Exhaust Seal → reduce the cost of the next TACTIC card you play this round by 1.

card.name: Wendigo
card.property: Creature form. Snowbird gets -1 THW, +1 ATK and her attacks gain overkill. Hero Action: Exhaust Wendigo → reduce the cost of the next MYSTIC card you play this round by 1.

alternate.name: Wendigo
alternate.property: Creature form. Snowbird gets -1 THW, +1 ATK and her attacks gain overkill. Hero Action: Exhaust Wendigo → reduce the cost of the next MYSTIC card you play this round by 1.

card.name: Don't Get Stuck!
card.property: Permanent. Setup. Forced Response: After the villain phase ends, place a permanence counter on your faceup creature form. Then, if there are 4 permanence counters on it, flip this card. Force Interrupt: When you flip this car of flip a creature form facedown, remoce each permance counter from it.

alternate.name: Stuck!
alternate.property: You cannot resolve Snowbird's "Great Beasts" ability. Your faceup creature form and stuck! gain permanent. When Revealed: Summon each non permanent creature form and remove them from the game. Treat each number 1 on the faceup creature card as a number 2 instead.

card.name: Vindicator
card.property: Play only if your identity as the ALPHA FLIGHT trait. Toughness. Vindicator gets retaliate 2 while she 3 or more remaining hit points.
"Just in time for the fun to begin!" - Vindicator

card.name: Aurora
card.property: Play only if your identity as the ALPHA FLIGHT or X-MEN trait. Companion. Fleeting. Response: After Aurora enters or leaves play, deal 1 damage to an enemy.

card.name: Captain Marvel
card.property: Play only if your identity as the ALPHA FLIGHT trait. [star] Interrupt: When Captain Marvel attacks, choose up to X enemies, where X is equal to the number of AERIAL characters you control → deal 2 damage to each chosen enemy.

card.name: Guardian
card.property: Play only if your identity as the ALPHA FLIGHT trait. Toughness. Guardian gets +1 THW ans +1 ATK while he has 3 or more remaining hit points.
"And STAY out, eh!" -Guardian

card.name: Marrina
card.property: Play only if your identity as the ALPHA FLIGHT trait. Response: After an enemy attacks Marrina, stun that enemy.
"The next time they try and break someone, they'll remember they're pretty fragile too." -Marrina

card.name: Nothstar
card.property: Play only if your identity as the ALPHA FLIGHT or X-MEN trait. Companion. Fleeting. Response: After Aurora enters or leaves play, remove 1 threat from a scheme.

card.name: Puck
card.property: Play only if your identity as the ALPHA FLIGHT trait. Reduce the amount of damage Puck takes from eac attack by 1..
"I was BORN ready! Sakkatchewan steel coming through!" -Puck

card.name: Sasquatch
card.property: Play only if your identity as the ALPHA FLIGHT or GAMMA trait. [star] If you paid for this card using only [mental] resources, your hero gets +1 hand size untl Sasquatch leaves play. If you paid for this card using only [physical] resources, Sasquatch gets +3 ATK.

card.name: Shaman
card.property: Play only if your identity as the ALPHA FLIGHT or MYSTIC trait. Hero Action: Exhaust Shaman → draw 1 card. If that card is an aspect or basic card, deal 1 damage to him.
"The spirits defer to my presence." -Shaman

card.name: Snowbird
card.property: Play only if your identity as the ALPHA FLIGHT or MYSTIC trait. Response: After Snowbird enters play, choose one: . Snowbird gets +1 ATK and her attacks gain piercing, . Snowbird gets + 2 hit points and gains retaliate 2, . Snowbird gets +1 THW and gains the AERIAL trait.

card.name: Shaman
card.property: Mystic Mastery — Hero Action: Exhaust Shaman → draw 1 card.
“Deep meditation will be required to understand this fully.”

alternate.name: Michael Twoyoungmen
alternate.property: Setup: Summon Shaman's Medicine Pouch and add it to your hand. [star] Medicine Man — Damage you heal using your basic recovery can be divided among your identity and 1 additional character as you choose.

card.name: Snowbird
card.property: Interrupt: When Snowbird exhausts, place or remove 1 shift counter from here. While the shift counters here are equal to (X), she gets: (1) +2 ATK and her attacks gain piercing. (2) +3 hit points and gains retaliate 2. (3) +2 THW and gains the [[AERIAL]] trait.

card.name: Astral Form
card.property: Hero Interrupt (defense): When the villain would deal damage to Shaman, confuse them instead.
“Synchronicity is a major component of magic.” —Shaman

card.name: Commune
card.property: Hero Action: Ready a [[MYSTIC]] card.
“Great Spirit, guide me!” —Shaman

card.name: Entangle
card.property: Hero Action (attack): Stun and deal 3 damage to an enemy. If a minion was stunned this way, ready Shaman.
“Deep in your heart, you know this is wrong.” —Shaman

card.name: Mystic Healing
card.property: Hero Action: Heal 1 damage and remove a status card from a character. If a status card was removed this way, ready Shaman.
“The soul, too, can be cured.” —Shaman

card.name: Mystic Dust
card.property: Hero Response: After you spend this card on a [[SPELL]] event, remove 1 threat from a scheme or ready Shaman.

card.name: Eaglet
card.property: Attach to a main scheme. Increase the target threat value of attached scheme by 4. Hero Interrupt: When Shaman would remove any amount of threat from attached scheme, remove 1 additional threat.

card.name: Refreshing Winds
card.property: Shaman gains the [[AERIAL]] trait. Hero Response: After Shaman defeats a minion or side scheme, ready him. (Limit once per phase.)

card.name: Shaman's Medicine Pouch
card.property: Hero Action: Exhaust Shaman's Medicine Pouch and discard a [[SPELL]] card from your hand → choose two: * Play a [[SPELL]] card from your discard pile (paying its cost) * Deal 1 damage to an enemy * Heal 1 damage from a character

card.name: Spirit Staff
card.property: Hero Action: Exhaust Spirit Staff → place a spirit counter on a card (to a maximum of 2 per card). Interrupt: When you use a basic power against a card with X spirit counters on it, you get +X to that power for this use.

card.name: Code Blue
card.property: Give to the Michael Twoyoungmen player. You cannot ready. Alter-Ego Action: Discard each [[SPELL]] card or printed [mental] resource from your hand. If 3 or more cards were discarded this way, remove Code Blue from the game.
“Paging Dr. Twoyoungmen.”

card.name: Sasquatch
card.property: Strategy — Forced Response: After the player phase begins, choose either [mental] or [physical] as your "Strategy" resource type. [star] While your "Strategy" resource type is: * [mental] - You get +1 THW. * [physical] - You get +1 ATK.

alternate.name: Walter Langkowski
alternate.property: Strategy — Forced Response: After the player phase begins, choose either [mental] or [physical] as your "Strategy" resource type. Action: Discard a card from your hand → if your "Strategy" resource type is [mental], draw 1 card. If it is [physical], ready Walter Langkowski. (Limit once per round.)

card.name: Puck
card.property: While your "Strategy" resource type is: * [mental] - Puck cannot take consequential damage. * [physical] - Puck cannot take damage from minion attacks.

card.name: Northern Exposure
card.property: Hero Action: Choose up to 3 different enemies. Place a different status card on each of them.
“I don't have time to mess around here.” —Sasquatch

card.name: Rushing Blow
card.property: You can only spend your "Strategy" resource type to pay for this card. Hero Action (attack/thwart): Deal damage to an enemy equal to your ATK or remove threat from a scheme equal to your THW.

card.name: Squatch Smash
card.property: Hero Interrupt: When you use a basic power, you get +6 for that use. If you paid for this card using only your "Strategy" resource type, draw 1 card.
“Squatch smash puny Canadians!” —Sasquatch

card.name: Unstoppable Farce
card.property: Hero Action: Ready Sasquatch. If you paid for this card using only your "Strategy" resource type, draw 1 card.
“I feel fine. Seriously.” —Walter Langkowski

card.name: Limitless Potential
card.property: Hero Interrupt: When you spend this card, treat it as if it has 3 printed resources of your "Strategy" resource type instead.

card.name: Walter's Lab
card.property: Walter Langkowski gets +2 REC. Alter-Ego Resource: Exhaust Walter's Lab → generate either a [mental] resource or a [physical] resource.
“Ever been hit by a Gamma Bomb, Jackie? It's a trip.” —Walter Langkowski

card.name: Boundless Fury
card.property: Hero form only. Sasquatch gets +1 THW, +1 ATK, and +1 DEF. Forced Response: After you change form, discard this card.
“Did you say 'furious' or 'furriest'?” —Puck

card.name: Immovable Subject
card.property: You get +4 hit points. Sasquatch gains retaliate 1.
“Turn around and back away.” —Sasquatch

card.name: Survivor's Guilt
card.property: Give to the Walter Langkowski player. Choose: * You are stunned. Discard this obligation. * You are confused. Discard this obligation.
“The Collective wiped 'em out. Only Walt lived.”

card.name: Puck
card.property: [star] Rebounding — Hero Response: After Puck uses a basic power, ready him. Then, he gets -1 THW, -1 ATK, and -1 DEF until the end of the phase.
“Aren't I just the luckiest little super-hero?”

alternate.name: Eugene Judd
alternate.property: Extended Longevity — Response: After you recover, choose to either ready Eugene Judd or give him a tough status card. (Limit once per round.)
“Vowed to live an interesting life. I've done okay.”

card.name: Sasquatch
card.property: Action: Exhaust Sasquatch → Puck gains the [[AERIAL]] trait until the end of this turn. Reduce the cost of the next [[TACTIC]] or [[AERIAL]] card you play this round by 1.
“Let's discuss our options, Eugene.”

card.name: Boing!
card.property: Hero Interrupt: When Puck would take 1 or more damage, reduce that amount by X. If you take no damage this way, stun or confuse an enemy.
“Losing a bit of your edge, eh?” —Puck

card.name: Bounce Around
card.property: Hero Action (attack/thwart): Choose to either deal damage to an enemy equal to your ATK or remove threat from a scheme equal to your THW. If a minion or side scheme was defeated this way, return this card to your hand. (Limit once per round per copy.)

card.name: Glance
card.property: Hero Interrupt: When Puck would take up to 3 damage, give him a tough status card instead.
“I don't think so. Now, let's get to work, eh!” —Puck

card.name: Ultra Durable
card.property: Hero Action: Give Puck a tough status card. If he is already tough, he gets +1 THW, +1 ATK, and +1 DEF until the end of the round instead.
“Small. Fast. Tough. Also, I'm a big hockey fan.” —Puck

card.name: Compressed Physiology
card.property: Puck ignores the piercing keyword. Hero Interrupt: When a tough status card is discarded from Puck, draw 1 card.

card.name: Double Down
card.property: Puck gets +1 DEF. Hero Interrupt: When a tough status card is discarded from Puck while resolving the effects of an enemy attack, deal 1 damage to the attacker.

card.name: Push Through
card.property: Hero Action: Exhaust Push Through → take 1 damage. Puck gets +1 THW or +1 ATK until the end of the round. (Limit once per round.)
Eugene's achondroplasia causes daily pain.

card.name: Surreptitious
card.property: Hero Action: Exhaust Surreptitious → Puck's next basic power ignores the guard and patrol keywords and crisis icons ([per_hero]). Action: Discard Surreptitious → ready your identity.

card.name: Achondroplasty
card.property: Give to the Eugene Judd player. You may flip to alter-ego form. You cannot ready your identity. Alter-Ego Action: Discard a tough status card from your identity → remove Achondroplasty from the game.

card.name: Vindicator
card.property: Vindicator cannot have more than 4 charge counters here. Vindicated — Response: After you heal any amount of excess damage from Vindicator, place up to that amount of charge counters here.

alternate.name: Heather Hudson
alternate.property: Dedicated — Action: Spend a [mental] resource → search your deck for a hero-specific ally or upgrade and add it to your hand. If Guardian is already in play, place 1 charge counter on him and 1 charge counter on Heather Hudson.

card.name: Guardian
card.property: Guardian gets +1 ATK for each charge counter here. Response: After Guardian uses a basic power, place 1 charge counter here. If there are 4 or more charge counters here, shuffle Guardian into your deck.

card.name: All of Us Command
card.property: Alliance. Hero Action: Remove 1 charge counter from Guardian or Vindicator for each [[ALPHA FLIGHT]] character in play → draw 1 card for each charge counter removed this way.

card.name: Patriot Love
card.property: Action: Ready your identity. Then, if you are in hero form, you may place 1 charge counter on Guardian or Vindicator.
“Hang on, Mac! I'll be right with you.” —Heather Hudson

card.name: Serve and Protect
card.property: Hero Interrupt (thwart): When you use a basic power, remove 4 threat from a scheme. If it is during the villain phase, heal 2 damage from your identity.
“It's alright. I've got you.” —Vindicator

card.name: Unexpected Blast
card.property: Hero Interrupt (attack): When you exhaust to use a basic power, deal 4 damage to an enemy. If it is during the villain phase, confuse the villain.
“Surprise, jackass!” —Vindicator

card.name: Anti-Gravity Generation
card.property: Hero Response: After you spend this card, heal 2 damage from Vindicator.

card.name: Department H
card.property: Action: Exhaust Department H → look at the top 2 cards of any deck. If you looked at your deck this way, add 1 of those cards to your hand and discard 1 card from your hand.
“Come in, Department H. This is Vindicator.” —Vindicator

card.name: Concussive Beams
card.property: Hero Action: Exhaust Concussive Beams and remove up to 2 charge counters from Vindicator → you gain retaliate X until the end of the round, where X is equal to the number of charge counters removed this way.

card.name: Energy Redirection
card.property: Hero Response: After you play a [[SUPERPOWER]] event, remove 1 charge counter from Vindicator → choose: * Add a copy of Anti-Gravity Generation from your discard pile to your hand. * Ready Vindicator.

card.name: Improved Power Cell
card.property: Attach to Guardian or Vindicator. Treat each printed number "4" on attached character's card as a "6" instead.
“Heather, this new power source is 50% more effective than the old model!” —Guardian

card.name: Vindicator's Helmet
card.property: Hero Action: Exhaust Vindicator's Helmet and discard the top card of the encounter deck. Then, take X damage, where X is equal to the number of boost icons ([boost]) on that card → Vindicator gets +X THW or +X ATK or +X DEF until the end of the round.

card.name: Care for Claire
card.property: Give to the Heather Hudson player. You may flip to alter-ego form. Choose: * Exhaust Heather Hudson → remove Care for Claire from the game. * Choose and discard 1 card from your hand. You cannot change form until your next turn ends. Discard this obligation.

card.name: Guardian
card.property: Charge — Special: Discard the top card of the encounter deck and place X charge counters here, where X is equal to the number of boost ([boost]) and star ([star]) icons on it. Then, if there are 4 or more charge counters here, take 1 damage and remove 2 charge counters from here.

alternate.name: James Hudson
alternate.property: Department H — Forced Response: After you change to this form, remove each charge counter from here. Shuffle a Guardian card from your discard pile into your deck for each charge counter discarded this way.

card.name: Vindicator
card.property: Vindicator gets +1 ATK for each charge counter here. Forced Interrupt: When 4 or more charge counters are here, discard Vindicator. Response: After Guardian uses a basic power, move a charge counter from Guardian to here.

card.name: All of Us Command
card.property: Alliance. Hero Action: Remove 1 charge counter from Guardian or Vindicator for each ALPHA FLIGHT character in play → draw 1 card for each charge counter removed this way.

card.name: From Far and Wide
card.property: Hero Action (thwart): Remove 3 threat from a scheme. Resolve Guardian's "Charge" ability. Then, remove 1 threat from a scheme for each charge counter on Guardian.
"It's time to seize our opportunity." —Guardian

card.name: Patriot Love
card.property: Action: Ready your identity. Then, if you are in hero form, you may place 1 charge counter on Guardian or Vindicator.
"...Ultimately it was not that we succeeded or failed, it was that we tried." —Guardian

card.name: True North Strong
card.property: Hero Action (attack): Resolve Guardian's "Charge" ability. Then, deal 4 damage to an enemy. Deal 1 additional damage to that enemy for each charge counter on Guardian.
"And stay out, eh?" —Guardian

card.name: Stand on Guard
card.property: Hero Interrupt (defense): When the villain initiates an attack against you, remove 2 charge counters from Guardian → cancel that attack and stun the villain.
"Not this time, fella." —Guardian

card.name: Glowing Heart
card.property: Hero Response: After you spend this card, resolve Guardian's "Charge" ability.

card.name: Omnijet
card.property: Hero Action: Exhaust Omnijet → resolve Guardian's "Charge" ability or place a charge counter on Vindicator.
"I'm flying this time, Walter." —Guardian

card.name: Improved Power Cell
card.property: Attach to Guardian or Vindicator. Treat each printed number "4" on attached character's card as a "6" instead.
"Heather, this new power source is 50% more effective than the old model!" —Guardian

card.name: Guardian's Suit
card.property: Guardian gets +1 ATK, +1 THW, and +1 DEF for every 2 charge counters on him.
Guardian's suit has a neural connection allowing him to allocate power where needed.

card.name: Department H
card.property: Give to the James Hudson player. You may flip to alter-ego form. Choose: • Exhaust James Hudson → remove Department H from the game. • Take 2 damage and remove each charge counter on Guardian. Discard this obligation.

card.name: Northstar
card.property: Damage is shared between your active identity and your set-aside identity. Agile 1. Reflex — Response: After Northstar makes a basic defense, remove 1 threat from a scheme. If this removes the last threat on that scheme, ready him.

alternate.name: Jean-Paul Beaubier
alternate.property: Damage is shared between your active identity and your set-aside identity. Setup: Set the Jeanne-Marie Beaubier identity card aside. Toute Suite — Response: After Jean-Paul Beaubier enters play, remove 1 threat from a scheme.

card.name: Aurora
card.property: Damage is shared between your active identity and your set-aside identity. Agile 1. Reflects — Response: After Aurora makes a basic defense, deal 1 damage to an enemy. If that enemy is defeated this way, ready her.

alternate.name: Jeanne-Marie Beaubier
alternate.property: Damage is shared between your active identity and your set-aside identity. "Je Reviens!" — Response: After Jeanne-Marie Beaubier enters play, deal 1 damage to a character.

card.name: Aurora
card.property: Permanent. Setup. This card's printed text box cannot be treated as if it were blank. [star] Aurora cannot defend, take damage, or have upgrades attached to her. Response: After Aurora enters play, deal 1 damage to an enemy.

alternate.name: Northstar
alternate.property: Permanent. This card's printed text box cannot be treated as if it were blank. [star] Northstar cannot defend, take damage, or have upgrades attached to him. Response: After Northstar enters play, remove 1 threat from a scheme.

card.name: Toujours en Mouvement
card.property: Hero Action: Choose two: • Ready Aurora. • Ready Northstar. • Ready the Supersonic upgrade.
"Northstar, don't just stand there!" —Aurora

card.name: Dépêche Toi!
card.property: Hero Action: Choose one: • Exhaust Northstar → remove 3 threat from a scheme. • Exhaust Aurora → deal 3 damage to an enemy. • Exhaust Aurora and Northstar → draw 3 cards.

card.name: Gestalt Photokinesis
card.property: Hero Action: Exhaust Aurora and Northstar → stun and confuse the villain and each minion engaged with you.
"Time to show them what the Beaubier twins can do, mon frère." —Aurora

card.name: Multiple Personalities
card.property: Action: Exhaust Aurora and discard the top card of your deck. If its printed resource is: [energy] - Deal 1 damage to each enemy engaged with you. [mental] - Remove 2 threat from each scheme. [physical] - Deal 3 damage to an enemy. [wild] - Resolve all of the above.

card.name: X-Factor Investigation
card.property: Action: Look at the top 4 cards of any deck and put them back in any order. Then, if the top two cards of that deck are the same card type, ready Northstar and draw 1 card.
"I searched everywhere, Kyle. Literally." —Northstar

card.name: French Connection
card.property: Hero Resource: Exhaust French Connection → generate the printed resource of your signature ally.
"Without Aurora -- without our special partnership -- there is little to bind me to the team." —Northstar

card.name: Rerun
card.property: Hero Action: Discard Rerun → shuffle each Aurora & Northstar event you played this turn into your deck. If 2 or more cards were shuffled this way, ready a card you control.
"Shall we give that another go?" —Northstar

card.name: Supersonic
card.property: Hero Interrupt: When Aurora or Northstar would resolve an ability on their character card or a use a basic power, exhaust Supersonic → treat a printed number "1" on that card as if it were a printed number "2" for that use.

card.name: Tag Team!
card.property: Permanent. Setup. Alter-Ego Action: Exhaust Tag Team! → swap your identity with the set-aside identity, flip your signature ally, and ready each of them. Then, swap all encounter cards and status cards attached to your signature ally with all encounter cards and status cards attached to your identity.

card.name: Different Lives
card.property: Give to the Aurora & Northstar player. You cannot exhaust your signature ally. Alter-Ego Action: Spend 3 resources of the same resource type as your signature ally → remove Different Lives from the game.

card.name: Hang on to Humanity
card.property: Give to the Narya Player. You may flip to alter-ego form. Choose: . Exhaust Narya → remove Hang on to Humanity from the game. . Place 2 permanence counters on your faceup creature form. Discard this obligation.

card.name: Master of the World
card.property: Drone minions get +1 SCH, +1 ATK and +1 hit points. master of the world gets +1 ATK for each acceleration token in play. Forced Interrupt: When Master fo the world attacks, resolve his attack aganst each ALPHA FLIGHT character. (ALPHA FLIGHT nemesis minion.)

card.name: Drone Master
card.property: Permanent. Forced Response: After your turn ends, if there is 1 or more threat here, resolve the "Drone Master" ability. card.name: Gravity Displacement

card.property: DRONE minons gain ranged. When Revealed: Resolve the "Drone Master" ability. When defeated: Resolve the "Drone Master" ability. [star] Boost: Place 3 threat on the Drone Master side scheme.

card.name: Increasing Drones
card.property: Each DRONE minion gets +1 ATK and gains toughness and retaliate 1. Hero Response: After you defeat a DRONE minion, spend 2[per_hero] resources → discard this card. [star] Boost: Place 3 threat on the Drone Master side scheme.

card.name: Master of the World
card.property: Drone minions get +1 SCH, +1 ATK and +1 hit points. master of the world gets +1 ATK for each acceleration token in play. Forced Interrupt: When Master fo the world attacks, resolve his attack aganst each ALPHA FLIGHT character. (ALPHA FLIGHT nemesis minion.)

card.name: Drone Master
card.property: Permanent. Forced Response: After your turn ends, if there is 1 or more threat here, resolve the "Drone Master" ability. Drone Master - Special: Discard te top 2 cards of the encounter deck. put each trachery discarded this way into play facedown, engaged with you as a drone minion. Each facedown encounter card Drone minon has base hit points of 1, base SCH of 0, base attack of 0 and the AERIAL trait.

card.name: Alpha Drone
card.property: DRONE minons gain ranged. When Revealed: Resolve the "Drone Master" ability. When defeated: Resolve the "Drone Master" ability. [star] Boost: Place 3 threat on the Drone Master side scheme.

card.name: Gravity Displacement
card.property: AERIAL characters get -1 ATK and -1 DEF. Ranged attacks deal 1 additional damage. Action: Discard 2 cards from you hand and the top 5 cards of the encounter deck → draw 2 cards. If the combined cost of those cards is 3 or more, discard this card. [star] Boost: Place 3 threat on the Drone Master side scheme.

card.name: Increasing Drones
card.property: Each DRONE minion gets +1 ATK and gains toughness and retaliate 1. Hero Response: After you defeat a DRONE minion, spend 2[per_hero] resources → discard this card. [star] Boost: Place 3 threat on the Drone Master side scheme.

card.name: Master of the World
card.property: Drone minions get +1 SCH, +1 ATK and +1 hit points. master of the world gets +1 ATK for each acceleration token in play. Forced Interrupt: When Master fo the world attacks, resolve his attack aganst each ALPHA FLIGHT character. (ALPHA FLIGHT nemesis minion.)
